title: Low ping (ongoing issue)
body:
Been having ongoing issues with my ping and I'm not sure if it's being caused by my ISP or something to do with the LoL server

I'm in WA on 25mbps - if I run a ping test to the Telstra server in Sydney I get an average return ~70ms (which my league used to get as well)

In the last few months, it's usually more like an average of ~110ms in game, usually closer to the higher 100s/low 200s

Anyone who knows anything about these things got any ideas what might be causing it? My initial feeling is my ISP is throttling my connection to the league server for some reason but idk

I've also just upgraded to a brand spanking new PC so that shouldn't be the issue

replies.body: exactly the same here man, please let me know if you find a solution.
